main event: On August 20, 1950, a bright bluish-white object was observed moving overhead at Nicosia Airfield in Cyprus.
interesting points: The object was seen moving at high speed with no trail left behind.,Witnesses described the object as being about 1/10 the size of the moon.,The observation lasted between 15 to 20 seconds.,The object appeared to move from the northwest to the southeast.,Several USAF personnel confirmed the sighting.
